website_summaries.verdict: Adorably-designed food system from popular brand name. Includes lots of nice perks, but may struggle with thicker food.
pros: Parents love this system's pour spout, as well as its dial system that helps you track freshness
cons: Machine sometimes struggles to handle thicker vegetables or chop grains

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was making a stage 2 puree with steamed broccoli and formula (I over steamed it so it would be extra soft for the blender) and it took 30 minutes to puree 1/2 cup of broccoli. A mom with a baby doesn't have that much time on their hands. For reference, 1/2 cup made about 3 containers of food. It would take hours to fill all the containers provided. I'm disappointed in this product and wish I could return it. The blades aren't powerful, no matter how soft the food you add is. For $50+ I expected higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: not blending
customer_reviews.text: I got it 2 dqys ago. Today I started using it, and decided to blen an apple. I put dices of the apple in and turned it on. The blades spined around while apple dices were on it remaining the same. Why? I shaked it many times, tried to put pieces close to the blades, but it was useless. I am totally disappointed. Returning...
customer_reviews.author: Gulnoza

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: Its a wonderful product! So helpful and needed for all the moms
customer_reviews.author: itzel romero

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this to make my baby’s food! It’s super cute and it works! I love the little containers that comes with it to make for easy storage! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Gwynita Rayford

customer_reviews.title: Blades don't catch the fruits if they are not in small pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to blend strawberries (cut in half) and apple (cut in 8 pieces). The blades won't catch the fruits to puree them no matter how hard I try. I tried to shake the jar, make the fruits into even smaller pieces (1/4 for strawberries) still the fruits would not be caught in the blade. I think if i cut the fruits in very small pieces it might blend them but that would be too much of work. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Nalin Ranjan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, recipe book is a plus
customer_reviews.text: So perfect for my little baby and very easy to use. I love all the extra containers and the recipe book that comes with it, very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: celeste001

customer_reviews.title: Food food food
customer_reviews.text: Great product it’s just like my nutribullet but for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Gear of nutri bullet baby melts
customer_reviews.text: Rubber Gear of nutri bullet baby melts and mixes with baby food . We have been feeding our baby for the past 10 days without realizing that rubber was melting and getting into the food until today where we saw sweet potato turning black in color . We definitely do not recommend this as we have been feeding baby with harmful chemicals .
customer_reviews.author: prem kiran

customer_reviews.title: that the package came in 8 days late .
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift . She hasn’t complained or gave me any bad updates . The only thing is that the package came in 8 days late .
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Cobb

customer_reviews.title: blade gets overwhelmed EASILY
customer_reviews.text: This set came with a freezing tray, and 6 date dial jars to keep food fresh and a recipe book. The blades get overwhelmed easily so you have to stop it and shake the blender multiple times. I was able to make 2 weeks worth of baby food in an hour and a half (which is a while if you ask me... good thing my baby takes long naps)
customer_reviews.author: mc.

customer_reviews.title: Does not operate as it should
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product, I am so frustrated with this machine, the setup and the blade to cut the fruit or veggies is way above that it could not blenderized well. It’s cute with cups and all but the product itself is not worth a try. Not safe for you to manually blenderized it as well, it does not have a power button to turn it on and off. Will return this!
customer_reviews.author: shiela decamos

customer_reviews.title: Good for soft foods not so much for apples etc..
customer_reviews.text: This is a good produc for baby food such as: rice flour, oatmeal,soft foods in general, but not so much for apples, and harder fruits. It gets the job done. I just wished it would of been a little more powerful for apples pears etc...
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wish I never bought this . The containers that come with it are to small to use for anything; the power of the blade is terrible. Save your money and buy a regular ninja . Works so much better and you can use it for a lot more . Waste of money .
customer_reviews.author: Charna D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for making and storing baby food
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted to make baby food for my son and this was an awesome buy! The blender works well and the cups that come with it are the right serving size for my 7 month old. I like the freezer addition but you do have to thaw all at once. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying making baby food with this bullet. It is easy to use and clean. I love the storage containers. They are a great size and fit my frozen cubes perfectly. My only complaint is the blender gets overwhlmed easy and will stop blending if u add too much.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S.

customer_reviews.title: Costco has better price
customer_reviews.text: It works well. blending power is weaker, compared to vita max, but of course it’s for baby food, so it doesn’t have to be a hardcore blender I guess. It’s very cute. But I found out Costco has the set with same price but an extra set of blending cup and storage capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Blends up nicely. I like all of the extras it comes with. That alone made it wkrth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Holl

customer_reviews.title: Third is a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I brought all 3 baby bullet as gift. and all the new mom love the gift
customer_reviews.author: LaWanda Beard

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use ! Perfect for stage 1 purees. Easy to clean/ come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Making baby food has become so much easier with this blender.. Along with the recipe booklet to help explore new tastes with your baby. Absolutely love that's it a time and cost saver. Would definitely recommend to any new mom!
customer_reviews.author: Gualbance

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The blender is not so much quality. Sheerness is looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Tsee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for healthung home made baby food. And juices. Far better than mine actually.
customer_reviews.author: JMC 91

customer_reviews.title: does not blend well.
customer_reviews.text: I dont normally write reviews. however, I felt like other moms need to know...it does not blend well whatsoever. I love the jars though(2 stars just for jars). luckly my mother in law gave me her ninja and that blends like a beast. I would not recommend this blender... save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. The little cups are perfect for a baby. Fast delivery and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Beth Whiddon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Blend
customer_reviews.text: This thing is disappointing. It doesn’t blend food very well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Baby Approved
customer_reviews.text: My great niece enjoys her meals with the baby bullet. It blends the food out to the same consistency of her store bought food. It helps my niece save money on baby food for her daughter. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Davidson

customer_reviews.title: I hope it can be improved
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is that the white rubber around the blade is not very clean and the food can run in if it's not noticed in time and it stinks
customer_reviews.author: huang

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I was trying to decide between this blender or the magic baby bullet blender. I’m glad I chose this one. It’s perfect and blends well. It definitely comes in hand when making my baby food. Give it a try, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn B.

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: Great for making baby food and the recipes are good also
customer_reviews.author: Spenc

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful
customer_reviews.text: It is not so good at blending slightly thicker food... so it output becomes quite watery!!
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Rimal

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it easy to use and I had no problems with it!!️
customer_reviews.author: James McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted to buy one and with a little one on the way I finally got this cute blender set. I tried it for smoothies and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a new family!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my neice. The different cups are great for sorting the food with easy cleaning and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.text: I loved this product it was easy to use. I used it to prepare my baby’s food .
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Good product but can’t blemd small portion
customer_reviews.text: Good product specifically for starting solids but blending not good when try small qty.

customer_reviews.title: that's terrible
customer_reviews.text: This food supplement machine is too bad, it only takes a month to become like this, and the black ink will get into the food

customer_reviews.title: It’s does the job
customer_reviews.text: It’s does the job. Just don’t put big pieces or frozen fruits and veggies in it.

customer_reviews.title: works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter now eats the same as mom and Dad

customer_reviews.title: Food color I changing harmful black powder
customer_reviews.text: It’s just one month now and the blender has some black color substance forming when you blend and is also entering in to the jar.. it’s adding black color to food .. it’s harmful to babies .. may be this product is a damaged one but over all bad experience do not buy..
customer_reviews.author: Satya

customer_reviews.title: Must have for moms
customer_reviews.text: As a mum this is absolute must have. It’s so easy to use and comes with this little jars with lids and dates on it ... u dnt have to buy a name stickers Steam your veges, put them in and mix it ... you will have nice smooth mashed goodness ready for your little one in less than a minute ... trust me it’s sooo easy to use , I am in love with this product , best part is that I can make food for my infant (fresh food) so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Aria 🌸

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Doesn’t blend.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. Only blended what was on the bottom. Couldn’t even blend bananas. Had to use my food processor, my $20 food processor worked so much better. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever ...... used for a week and it’s losing black colour oil .... blade making loud noise
customer_reviews.author: Shradha

customer_reviews.title: Recommend !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my baby and for my sister. Really fast to use and I’m happy with the size of the containers. You don’t waste food and you can refrigerate the product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

product_meta.title: Nutribullet Baby 18-Piece
product_meta.description: Quickly puree and store fresh, healthful baby food for your little one with the NutriBullet Baby Food Prep System. This full set gives you all the tools you need to make nutritious food from scratch, in minutes. As a new parent, you’ve got lots of love for your little one. What you don’t have? Time. That’s where the NutriBullet Baby comes in. More than a food processor, it’s a complete food pureeing and storing system. No more expensive, minimally nutritious pre-packaged jars, no questionable ingredients. Just fresh, wholesome baby food made in minutes.
feature_bullets: Make fresh, delicious food with wholesome ingredients
Prepare, store, and freeze for grab-and-go convenience.
Dishwasher-safe for quick and easy cleanup

Included: (1) 200 Watt Motor Base, (1) Baby Blending Blade, (1) 32 oz (900ml) Batch Bowl with Lid, (1) 12 oz (355ml) Short Cup with Handles and Re-sealable Lid, (6) Storage Cups with Date Ring Lids and Storage Tray, (1) Silicone Freezer Tray with Lid and Recipe Book
Batch Bowl and Cups are made of non-toxic, BPA-Free, super-durable plastic
Included Components: Motor Base, Batch Bowl, Storage Containers With A Date Dial To Track Freshness, 12 Oz. Silicone Tray
